name: Floette
flavorText:
It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for
flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws
out the hidden power of flowers to battle.
formDescription:
Floette's five regular forms only differ in appearance.  Floette's flower is set when it is encountered, or as a Flabébé, and cannot be changed.

Eternal Floette has higher stats, cannot evolve or breed, and learns light of ruin at level 50.  It is currently not obtainable.
